item.description:
Special Event at the Stoneham Theatre, a professional not-for-profit regional theatre in Stoneham MA
"Always... Patsy Cline" created by Ted Swindley starring Becky Barta
based on a true story about the legendary country singer's friendship with a fan from Houston named Louise Seger, this rollicking musical tribute includes many of Patsy's unforgettable hits such as "Crazy," "I Fall to Pieces," "Sweet Dreams" and "Walking After Midnight."
http://stonehamtheatr...

showtime 7:30pm

Premium Seating $48, $42 senior discount
Standard Seating $44, $40 senior discount

Call Carol at Stoneham Theatre,
781-279-7885 to reserve tickets
and mention you are with Debra's group.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Special Event:: Always.... Patsy Cline
